title: Who is the author of history? Who writes the new chapter? - Quora

response.answer_text: There was this beautiful book I read called The Sense of an Ending. Julian Barnes, the author, has made a few brilliant statements about history. Probably I could answer your question with the words of this amazing author; “What you end up remembering isn't always the same as what you have witnessed.” “What is history? Any thoughts, Webster?' 'History is the lies of the victors,' I replied, a little too quickly. 'Yes, I was rather afraid you'd say that. Well, as long as you remember that it is also the self-delusions of the defeated. ... 'Finn?' '"History is that certainty produced at the point where the imperfections of memory meet the inadequacies of documentation."
